name: Salomon RC 8 Nocturne Prolink Boots - Unisex
description: This performance-oriented boot is aimed at athletic classic skiers seeking speed and control on groomed trails. The RC8 Nocturne Prolink Boots have a classic flex profile that provides excellent feel for the snow, while an adjustable heel strap pairs with Salomon's time-tested Quicklace system for a secure fit.Flex profile is optimized for classic skiing, providing good feel for the snow and ski control.Zippered lace cover makes for a warm, low-profile upper.Quicklace system provides a secure fit with a single pull.Heel strap holds your foot in place.Internal heel counter adds stability and comfort.Nocturne 360 degree reflective details keep you visible.
